traits.name: Council Leverage

entries.name: Magister Astalor Bloodsworn

traits.name: Naaru Containment

traits.name: Doctrine of the Blade

Most recently, she's taken it upon herself to initiate an investigation of a suspected traitor within the ranks of the Magistry.

traits.name: Glyph Anchor
